content: Whether you're waiting in line for a hamburger at a fast food restaurant, sitting in the boardroom of the Central Bank, or visiting the parliament, everyone in Romania has something to say about the economy, starting with Prime Minister, Adrian Nastase.
translations: ita:Che siate in fila per un hamburger in un fast food, seduti nella sala del consiglio di amministrazione della Banca Centr
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
